blocks.content_html:
Navigation

Unreal Engine C++ API Reference > Editor > UnrealEd > Editor

Inheritance Hierarchy

  • UEngine
  • UEditorEngine
  • UUnrealEdEngine

References

   
Module UnrealEd
Header /Engine/Source/Editor/UnrealEd/Classes/Editor/UnrealEdEngine.h
Include #include "Editor/UnrealEdEngine.h"

Syntax

UCLASS (Config=Engine, Transient, MinimalAPI)  
class UUnrealEdEngine :  
    public UEditorEngine ,  
    public FNotifyHook

Variables

  Type Name Description
TArray< TObjectPtr< class UAnimCompress > > AnimationCompressionAlgorithms Global list of instanced animation compression algorithms.
TObjectPtr< class UAutoReimportManager > AutoReimportManager Manager responsible for configuring auto reimport
uint32: 1 bNeedWarningForPkgEngineVer Whether the user needs to be prompted about a package being saved with an engine version newer than the current one or not
bool bPivotMovedIndependently Whether the pivot has been moved independently
uint32: 1 bShowPackageNotification Whether there is a pending package notification
TWeakPtr< SNotificationItem > CheckOutNotificationWeakPtr Weak Pointer to the file checkout notification toast.
TArray< TObjectPtr< UClass > > ClassesToIgnoreDeleteReferenceWarning When deleting actors, these types should not generate warnings when references will be broken (this should only be types that don't affect gameplay)
FComponentVisualizerManager ComponentVisManager Manages currently active visualizer and routes interactions to it
TMap< FName, TSharedPtr< class FComponentVisualizer > > ComponentVisualizerMap Map from component class to visualizer object to use
TObjectPtr< class UCookOnTheFlyServer > CookServer Cooker server incase we want to cook on the side while editing...
TObjectPtr< class AActor > CurrentLODParentActor Current target for LOD parenting operations (actors will use this as the replacement)
TObjectPtr< class UUnrealEdOptions > EditorOptionsInst Global instance of the editor options class.
TObjectPtr< class UMaterial > MaterialCopyPasteBuffer A buffer for implementing material expression copy/paste.
TUniquePtr< IPackageAutoSaver > PackageAutoSaver The package auto-saver instance used by the editor
TArray< TWeakObjectPtr< UPackage > > PackagesDirtiedThisTick A list of packages dirtied this tick
TArray< FString > PackagesToBeFullyLoadedAtStartup Array of packages to be fully loaded at Editor startup.
TMap< TWeakObjectPtr< UPackage >, uint8 > PackageToNotifyState A mapping of packages to their checkout notify state.
FPerformanceMonitor * PerformanceMonitor Instance responsible for monitoring this editor's performance
TObjectPtr< class USoundCue > SoundCueCopyPasteBuffer A buffer for implementing sound cue nodes copy/paste.
TMap< FName, int32 > SpriteIDToIndexMap Mapping of sprite category ids to their matching indices in the sorted sprite categories array
TArray< FTemplateMapInfo > TemplateMapInfos List of info for all known template maps
TArray< FComponentVisualizerForSelection > VisualizersForSelection
